Name: Tamakushi Casket
Title: Sangonomiya Kokomi: Tamakushi Casket
Desc: Wisdom yet revealed from the casket parallels tides yet unfolded by the sea.
Source: Reward for inviting Sangonomiya Kokomi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Tamakushi Casket
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1205]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1205] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12053]</color> once.
When your $[A1205], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S12053]</color>: Summon a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112051]</color> with a $[K3] of 1; if <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112051]</color> is already on the field, then increase its $[K3] by 1 instead.
While <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112052]</color> exists, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112051]</color> deals +1 DMG.
(You must have $[A1205] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C112051.Name: Bake-Kurage
C112051.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K102], heal your active character for 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>ï¼šDMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C112052.Name: Ceremonial Garment
C112052.Desc: The character to which this is attached has their <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached uses a Normal Attack:</color> Heal 1 HP for all your characters.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
